personalInformation.biography: I'm a tech guy who really enjoys what I do for a living, here you'll find a little bit more about myself as well as the projects I worked on, personal interests, my professional experiences, ideias I have in mind (maybe I'll start a blog someday... Wouldn't count on that though) and my contact information.
